description: This creamy lasagne recipe has wholesome and rich flavours.
name: Chicken Lasagne Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 500g chicken breasts, chopped as finely as possible
2 medium carrots, peeled and finely diced
1 medium white onion, peeled and finely diced
1 medium leek, peeled and finely diced
1 stick celery, peeled and finely diced

recipeInstructions.text: Heat up a non-stick pan and fry the chopped chicken for 3 minutes while turning.
Remove from the pan and set to one side.
Now add all the veg to the pan with the passata and herbs and fry everything together for 10 minutes while tossing. Remove from the heat.
Now layer your ingredients with the pasta sheets and sauces in your choice of baking dish.
Bake in the oven for 25 minutes, after 15 minutes, add the grated cheese to the top of the dish and return to the oven.
